body.p: My Nephew, Alfred Thruston Pope, studied law with me, & last winter graduated in the law school here, & is now in my office --
He would like to be a Notary Public.
Would it be asking too Much to request you to give him a commission. For its, I will be greatly obliged --

I have the honor to be,
Very res,
Yr Obt Srvt,
Hamilton Pope

His Excellency,
James. F. Robinson,
Frankfort Ky

Jefferson Co.
A. T. Pope
Notary
Appd May. 13.th 1863.
